Main.title: Participate in surveys and get paid!
Main.subtitle: Join our online community and start earning today!

About.title: About project
About.subtitle: SpeakOut offers you a unique opportunity to turn your opinion into real money. Take surveys, share your thoughts and get rewarded for each answer.

1.title: Project objectives:
1.subtitle: Contribution to the development of products and services through user opinions.

2.title: Our mission:
2.subtitle: We strive to provide an opportunity for people to earn money by sharing their opinions, as well as to help companies and organizations obtain valuable data to make informed decisions. We are confident that every vote matters, and our platform is designed to ensure that this value is rewarded.

process.title: How it works
process.subtitle: Don't miss the opportunity to improve your financial situation by taking just a few minutes a day. Sign up now and start getting paid for your opinion!

1.title: Sign-up on the website
1.description: After registration, you will receive warm-up surveys and earn 8000 UZS

2.title: Participate in surveys
2.description: We will send emails or Telegram messages inviting you to take part in interesting surveys винтересных опросах

3.title: Get paid for completing the survey
3.description: The amount of the reward will depend on the length and complexity of the completed survey

4.title: Withdraw money
4.description: After accumulating 9,000 UZS, the money can be withdrawn to the phone

1.title: Additional income
1.description: Participants can take part in the survey and earn income

2.title: Flexibility, comfort
2.description: The panel allows you to participate in surveys from anywhere and at convenient times

3.title: Say your mind
3.description: Participants can influence public issues by displaying their world-view

4.title: Saving
4.description: Cost reduction compared to traditional research methods

5.title: Topics
5.description: Online panels offer a wide variety of research topics ranging from marketing to health care.

6.title: Privacy
6.description: Participants can stay anonymous, which ensures their confidentiality.

1.question: How much will I get for completing one survey?
1.answ: You will receive a reward for completing one survey, which may vary depending on the specific survey and platform. This can usually be a monetary reward, bonuses, gifts, or other forms of compensation. The amount of remuneration depends on the duration of the survey, the complexity of the questions and the requirements of the customer.

2.question: How long does it take to participate in the survey?
2.answ: The time required to complete the survey may vary, but most of the questions are designed for 5-15 minutes.

3.question: How can I get paid for participating in surveys?
3.answ: Payments can be made to a card linked to your number. And you can also spend the money you earn on charity

4.question: Can I be sure that my personal data is securely protected?
4.answ: Your privacy and security are important to us. We take measures to protect your personal data: Encryption: We use modern encryption methods to protect the transfer of data between you and our servers. Authentication: Only authorized employees who have been authenticated have access to your data. Physical security: Our servers are located in secure premises with limited access. Threat monitoring and detection: We constantly monitor the activity of our systems and respond to any suspicious activity. Privacy Policy: We have a strict privacy policy that governs the collection, storage and use of your data.

5.question: What happens to my responses after participating in the survey?
5.answ: The answers are analyzed and used for research purposes, but personal information remains confidential
